sentence.Network_en: None of the explanations offered is demonstrably correct — or demonstrably incorrect.
sentence.Network_cn: 所提供的解释没有一个显然是正确或不正确的.

sentence.Network_en: It is demonstrably an unfair comparison.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样打比方显然不公平。

sentence.Network_en: The toolbar idiom has been demonstrably effective and convenient.
sentence.Network_cn: 实践中证明,工具栏习惯用法既方便又有效.

PerfectNetExp.abs: definitely,demonstrably(确然),assuredly(确实地) 献花(0) +1  (本文系MouseHappy首藏)相关文章汉语教学的语篇关系2006-04-08 leolaoshi  英语阅读与写作的.
英语语言词典  # 翻译 ... ...  可论证地 demonstrably 凭论证 demonstrably.

list.abs: 口译词汇积累（2）|英语口语词汇 ... civilian 平民 demonstrator 示威者 Iraqi National Museum 伊拉克国家博物馆.

个人简历英文翻译词汇大全_百度文库 ... decrease 减少 demonstrate 证明，示范 design 设计.

entry.tran: 可证明的;可论证的;可表明的;明显的
entry.def: A demonstrable fact or quality can be shown to be true or to exist.

example.ex: The road safety programme is having a demonstrable effect on road users...
example.tran: 道路安全方案在道路使用者身上逐渐显现出明显的效果。

example.ex: Despite its demonstrable speed and safety, the boat failed to become popular.
example.tran: 虽然其速度和安全性都可得到证明，但这种船还是不受欢迎。

means.word_mean: 1. in an obvious and provable manner;

auth_sentence.content: I merely take issue with your demonstrably specious logic.
auth_sentence.res_content: I merely take issue with your demonstrably specious logic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I merely take issue with your demonstrably specious logic.

auth_sentence.content: This seems to be flat out, demonstrably wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content: This seems to be flat out, demonstrably wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This seems to be flat out, demonstrably wrong.

auth_sentence.content: Suggesting this is more robust than TMS is demonstrably false.
auth_sentence.res_content: Suggesting this is more robust than TMS is demonstrably false.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Suggesting this is more robust than TMS is demonstrably false.
